PROVENANCE: AHRQ National Inpatient Sample, Healthcare Cost & Utilization Project (HCUP), 2019, CCSR BLD007
INTENTION: ICD10CM Body System (largely aligned with ICD10CM chapters) diseases of the blood and blood-forming organs and certain disorders involving the immune mechanism. BLD contains 10 categories that include diseases related to the blood, diseases of blood-forming organs, and certain disorders involving the immune mechanism such as nutritional anemia, sickle cell/trait anemia, and immunity disorders.
LIMITATION: The grouping is based on Clinical Classifications Software Refines (CCSR). The CCSR for ICD10CM provides a method for aggregating the diagnosis codes into over 530 clinical categories across 21 body systems.  For more information about the CCSR: https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/toolssoftware/ccsr/DXCCSR-User-Guide-v2022-1.pdf
